questions.question: This arc features a battle on an island with a giant tree, where Luffy and crew face off against a Warlord of the Sea and a corrupt king. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face a challenge against a Warlord of the Sea known for his ability to turn people into toys. What is...?
Taking place on a ghostly island, this arc introduces a skeleton musician and features battles against zombie-like enemies. What is...?
This ability, seen in the Wano arc, allows the user to transform into an ancient dragon. What is...?
questions.answer: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Kaido's Dragon

questions.question: This technique, a staple of Roronoa Zoro, involves rapidly slashing at an opponent in a circular motion. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows for the creation and manipulation of soap and bubbles. What is...?
This character, originally from Drum Island, is noted for his blue-nose and ability to shapeshift. Who is...?
Known for his 'Fire Fist' attack, this character is the sworn brother of the Straw Hat Pirates' captain and had the Flame-Flame Fruit. Who is...?
This character, introduced in the Dressrosa arc, possesses the power of the Hobby-Hobby Fruit and can turn people into toys. Who is...?
